CharacterList.Name: Sakura
CharacterList.Appearance: Sakura is a fire element character.
CharacterList.Personality: She comes from the distant lands of Aden, being a bounty hunter she is interested in the precious artifacts found in these lands. Sakura has high critical damage as well as instant damage abilities. Her weakness is fighting against water elemental creatures, especially if they have instant damage.

CharacterList.Name: Rena
CharacterList.Appearance: Rena is a water element character.
CharacterList.Personality: She's been on these battlefields for what seems like an eternity, but we don't know exactly how long she's been here. Rena is an ancient water element creature with periodic damage and a high crit chance, but she is weak against opponents with the lightning element, especially if that creature has periodic damage.

CharacterList.Name: Motoko
CharacterList.Appearance: Motoko is a lightning element character.
CharacterList.Personality: A wanderer who seems to have been everywhere, or nowhere? Has anyone seen him? Rumor has it that all creatures who have ever seen him were defeated by him in an instant. But what we do know is that this character can take a lot of instant damage and deal a lot of crushing damage. He doesn't have a lot of critical damage, but every attack he makes can be his enemy's last. His weakness is fighting against creatures with the wood element, especially if that creature has intermittent damage.

CharacterList.Name: Hayate
CharacterList.Appearance: Hayate is a wood element character.
CharacterList.Personality: The huge castle of Altdream, more like a city, was once home to thousands of people. One day, one of the guards discovered the ability to control wooden objects and then the earth. One day, while practicing with the elements, not far from the castle, the knight sent the entire castle underground, destroying everyone in it. He became maddened by his own power and now constantly seeks out creatures to destroy. His strength is periodic damage. His weakness is fighting creatures with the element of fire, especially if those creatures deal instant damage.
